casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Darren MONTGOMERY, Petitioner No. 481 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 12, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 12 th day of March, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by petitioner, is:

(1) Did not the Superior Court err, in a published opinion, in holding that a handgun that was only partially tucked into a waistband, with the handle being visible to all, was nonetheless "concealed" for the purposes of the Uniform Firearms Act?
